properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stonington, ME to Port Clyde, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Port Clyde, ME to Cape Elizabeth, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth, ME to Merrimack River, MA out 25 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 18 at 9:24PM EST until February 19 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas
7 to 10 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Merrimack River, MA to Stonington,
ME out to 25 NM.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
